abstract: The topics from the Technical Interchange Meeting for the NASA Space Exploration Initiative are presented in viewgraph form. The objective is to share a perspective of a cost-effective cooperation management structure of NASA and industry as we move towards the 21st century and the national commitment to continue our exploration in space with humans. Some of the topics covered include a personal background, today's culture, new approaches, congressional oversight, programmatic impact, and recommendations.
title: Cooperation in space

publications.publicationName: NASA. Lyndon B. Johnson Space Center, Third SEI Technical Interchange: Proceedings
